<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Goblin Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=43) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 48 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Others might look upon them with disdain, but you know that the weapons of your people are as effective as they are sharp. You are trained with the [dogslicer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=49) and [horsechopper](/Weapons.aspx?ID=53).

 In addition, you gain access to all uncommon [goblin](/Traits.aspx?ID=81) weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial goblin weapons are simple weapons and advanced goblin weapons are martial weapons.

<title level="2">Goblin Weapon Familiarity leads to...</title>
[Goblin Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=50), [Goblin Weapon Frenzy](/Feats.aspx?ID=47)
name: Goblin Weapon Familiarity
